main event: An unidentified flying object was sighted by pilots and ground observers at Perrin Air Force Base, Texas on July 9, 1953.
interesting points: The object was described as being round and white in color, and was observed to be going straight up.
The pilot made two passes at the object but was unable to get closer than a mile.
The light was said to be going straight up.
Two jet interceptors were scrambled to investigate the object, but it disappeared before they could make visual contact.
The object made a rapid and sudden change in direction and speed, unlike any known aircraft.
